Articles.Content:
When I play my game and I try to launch a spaceship. I will be spam the launch button it never goes to the launch pad so I can luanch my rocket! :sos:

[mod]Easy on the smileys there champ.[/mod]
Just wait a bit for the craft to load in (generally indicated by a slight movement), then try launch.

If after waiting as Nooblet68 suggests you are still unable to launch, something to know is that if the mouse pointer is over the stage bar, you will not be able to control your craft, so make sure the pointer is away from the left hand edge of the screen.

it never goes to the launch pad
Are you saying you can\'t leave the VAB?
